subSubSection.paragraph:

Niedbała, 1998
b,
2000
;
Niedbała & Corpuz-Raros, 1998
.

26 ° 43 ' 42.90 "N
,
117 ° 28 ' 18.51 "E

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 16–22.
Austrotritia saraburiensis Aoki, 1965
(specimen from Fujian): 16, lateral view of body (legs removed); 17, prodorsum, dorsal view; 18, ventral plate; 19–21, trochanter, femur, genu and tibia: 19, leg I; 20, leg II; 21, leg III; 22, leg IV. Scale bars = 200 μm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
China : Yunnan Province, Pingbian County (
22 ° 59 ' 0.83 "N
,
103 ° 41 ' 15.41 "E
): one adult (in alcohol, W- 93 - 26 ), from litter under Subtropical rain forest, 1600 M,
21 Dec.
, 1992 , leg. Ru-Xun Liu and Yan-Gong Xu. China : Anhui Province, Guangde County (
30 ° 53 ' 37.62 "N
,
119 ° 25 ' 1.93 "E
): two adults (in alcohol, Wan- 91 - 1 ), from litter, leg. Zong-Ying Wang.
Newly recorded from China
.

Measurements of adults (specimens from Fujian): prodorsum: length 435–485 , width 315–390 , height 130–155 , sensillus 130 , setae: ro 55 , in 60 , le 65 , distance between setae: ro -ro 70 , in -in 105 , le -le 290 , in -le 90 , le -ro 255 ; notogaster: length 775–980 , width 570–750 , height 580–755 ; setae: c

200 ; ventral region: genito-aggenital plate 240 × 160 , anal and adanal plates 480 × 125 .

Prodorsum with two pairs of lateral carinae and one dorsal carina; sensillus setiform, smooth, gradually tapering; interlamellar and rostral setae rough, thick and erect, lamellar seta fine and procumbent, exobothridial seta vestigial. Setae of notogaster short, rough, rigid and curved. Genito-aggenital plates with nine pairs of genital and two pairs of aggenital setae; one pair of anal and three pairs of adanal setae present. Leg chaetotaxy (without tarsi): I: 1-4 - 5 ( 2 )- 5 ( 1 ); II: 1-4 - 4 ( 1 )- 3 ( 1 ), III: 3 - 2-3 ( 1 )- 3 ( 1 ), IV: 3 - 2 - 2 ( 1 )- 3 ( 1 ).
Distribution. China (Anhui, Fujian, Guangdong, Hunan, Yunnan), Indonesia , Japan , Malaysia , Maldives Islands, Pacific Islands, Philippines , Sri Lanka , Thailand , Vietnam .
